content: Sporting event delegation **[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)** participated in the [1954 Asian Games](/wiki/1954_Asian_Games) held in the capital city of [Manila](/wiki/Manila), [Philippines](/wiki/Philippines). This country was ranked 9th with a gold medal, 4 silver medals and 4 bronze medals with a total of 9 medals. ## Medalists MedalNameSportEvent Gold[Gan Eng Teck](/wiki/Gan_Eng_Teck) Ho Kian Bin Kee Soon Bee Keith Mitchell [Oh Chwee Hock](/wiki/Oh_Chwee_Hock) [Tan Eng Bock](/wiki/Tan_Eng_Bock) Tan Hwee Hock [Wiebe Wolters](/wiki/Wiebe_Wolters) [Water polo](/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Men's Team](/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) SilverChan Onn Leng [Athletics](/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Men's 400 m hurdles](/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) Silver[Mary Klass](/wiki/Mary_Klass) [Athletics](/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Women's 100 m](/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) SilverBulat Bin Ismail [Athletics](/wiki/Boxing_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Men's Welterweight 67kg](/wiki/Boxing_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) SilverOng Choon Lim Tan Teow Choon [Lionel Chee](/wiki/Lionel_Chee) [Neo Chwee Kok](/wiki/Neo_Chwee_Kok) [Swimming](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Men's 4 Ã— 200 m freestyle relay](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) Bronze[Tang Pui Wah](/wiki/Tang_Pui_Wah) [Athletics](/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Women's 80 m hurdles](/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) Bronze[Neo Chwee Kok](/wiki/Neo_Chwee_Kok) [Swimming](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Men's 100 m freestyle](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) Bronze[Chay Weng Yew](/wiki/Chay_Weng_Yew) [Weightlifting](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Men's Featherweight 60 kg](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) BronzeHarold de Castro [Weightlifting](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1954_Asian_Games)[Men's Light heavyweight 82.5 kg](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1954_Asian_Games) ##
